title: Nutch – How It Works
dc:creator: Florian Hartl
description:
After the installation of Nutch as described in my previous post, you can either follow this tutorial without the need of thinking, or get a sense of how Nutch actually works beforehand. I recommend doing both in parallel. And since you won’t find the latter on the Apache Nutch Website, let me help you out in this matter. The following illustration depicts the major parts as well as the workflow of a crawl: The injector takes all the URLs of the nutch.txt file and adds them to the crawldb. As a central part of Nutch, the crawldb maintains information on all known URLs…
